12.04.2006 AK SCR10926 change access mode of tables CODE to READ
to be used for REPORT_ARCHIVE (REPA) date

back to user language if report is created

-- report has to be printed in GNRL_LANGUAGE
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Switch system language to GNRL_LANGUAGE, in which report has to be produced
-- Switch system language back to user language

STP.TXT: E R R O R : M I S S I N G P A R A M E T E R ( S H O U L D B E - N , I , S , o r T )

BXA503B Print lines on the report

ExpSyntax.val: Fill (' ',Len ({0,8})-Len (Trim (MlsTrans ('W I T H A D M I N I S T R A T I O N'))))&Trim (MlsTrans ('W I T H A D M I N I S T R A T I O N'))
Fill (' ',Len ({0,9})-Len (Trim (MlsTrans ('W I T H O U T A D M I N I S T R A T I O N'))))&Trim (MlsTrans ('W I T H O U T A D M I N I S T R A T I O N'))

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT CMOC.CMOC_COUNTRY, cast(sum( CASE WHEN (CLNT.CLNT301_DUNNINGBYCLIENT='N' and CCRY.CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK='Y') THEN CASE WHEN (CLNT.CLNT601_CALCULATECREDITNOTES='Y') THEN (CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO - CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALCREDNOTESMAN - CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALCREDNOTESAUTO ) ELSE (CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO) end ELSE 0 END ) as decimal(13,2))as V_WITH_W
, cast(sum( CASE WHEN (CLNT.CLNT301_DUNNINGBYCLIENT='N' and CCRY.CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK='N') THEN CASE WHEN (CLNT.CLNT601_CALCULATECREDITNOTES='Y') THEN (CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO - CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALCREDNOTESMAN - CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALCREDNOTESAUTO ) ELSE (CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO) end ELSE 0 END )as decimal(13,2)) as V_WITH_WO , cast(sum( CASE WHEN (CLNT.CLNT301_DUNNINGBYCLIENT='Y' and CCRY.CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK='Y') THEN CASE WHEN (CLNT.CLNT601_CALCULATECREDITNOTES='Y') THEN (CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO - CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALCREDNOTESMAN - CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALCREDNOTESAUTO ) ELSE (CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO) end ELSE 0 END )as decimal(13,2)) as V_WITHOUT_W , cast(sum( CASE WHEN (CLNT.CLNT301_DUNNINGBYCLIENT='Y' and CCRY.CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK='N') THEN CASE WHEN (CLNT.CLNT601_CALCULATECREDITNOTES='Y') THEN (CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO - CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALCREDNOTESMAN - CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALCREDNOTESAUTO ) ELSE (CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMOC.CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO) end ELSE 0 END ) as decimal(13,2))as V_WITHOUT_WO
FROM :1/CMOC AS CMOC join :1/CLNT AS CLNT on CMOC.CMOC_ADMNO=CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and CMOC.CMOC_CLNTNO= CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO join :1/CCRY AS CCRY on CMOC.CMOC_ADMNO=CCRY.CCRY308_ADMNO and CMOC.CMOC_CLNTNO= CCRY.CCRY308_CLNTNO and CMOC.CMOC_COUNTRY=CCRY.CCRY308_COUNTRY WHERE CMOC.CMOC_YEAR=:2 and CMOC.CMOC_CURRENCY=':3' and :4 GROUP BY CMOC.CMOC_COUNTRY ORDER by CMOC.CMOC_COUNTRY
